data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Konstantinov, Fedor V., Korzeev, Andrei I. (2014): Solenoxyphus Reuter, 1875 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae): revised diagnosis, a new species and new generic synonym. Zootaxa 3860 (5): 464-478, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3860.5.5
